doc.field: Shr 1.10 dlrs vs 1.33 dlrs Net 3,065,000 vs 3,730,000 Sales 273.9 mln vs 241.0 mln Year Shr 3.27 dlrs vs 2.62 dlrs Net 9,168,000 vs 7,338,000 Sales 1.07 billion vs 987.2 mln NOTE: Fiscal 1987 net includes tax credits of 10 cts for the fourth quarter and 1.04 dlrs for the year compared with 43 cts and 85 cts in the respective periods of fiscal 1986.
